name: Tree Hopper (supahchadu)
description:
Game Version : 1.0.6

[Playing on Mobile] : Game can be Very Buggy, but playable.

[Playing on PC]: IF laggy, please turn-on Hardware Acceleration on browser.

[How To Play]

First Click/Tap -> Drag -> Release = For the Character to jump towards the direction.
Maximum Drag = More Jump Power.

[Notes:]

  • Checkpoint spawns every 50 ft / 15 meters.
  • Hitting the Restart Button spawns you to a recent Checkpoint.

[GOAL]: Players must endure all the seasons while reaching the top and collect the forbidden fruit.

[Patch Note: 1.0.6]

* Added Markers for Platform Collisions
* Fixed Minor Visual Bug ( Tree branches overlapping the Moon )
* Added Minor Visuals
* Fixed Border Visual bug for Mobile

[Patch Note: 1.0.0-5]
Graphics Overhaul and Minor Bug Fixes
